entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Snow level rising to 1500 metres in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:16 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to valley bottom in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 6:16 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
